title: ライフラインの活性化
uml:
@startuml
autoactivate on
alice -> bob : hello
bob -> bob : self call
bill -> bob #005500 : hello from thread 2
bob -> george ** : create
return done in thread 2
return rc
bob -> george !! : delete
return success
@enduml

title: ユーザー認証プロセス
注文処理フロー
uml:
@startuml
customer -> webapp : place order
webapp -> orderService : process order
orderService -> inventory : check stock
inventory --> orderService : stock available
orderService --> webapp : order processed
webapp --> customer : confirmation
@enduml

title: メール送信プロセス
uml:
@startuml
user -> emailClient : compose email
emailClient -> smtpServer : send email
smtpServer -> recipient : deliver email
recipient --> smtpServer : email received
smtpServer --> emailClient : delivery status
emailClient --> user : confirmation
@enduml

title: データベースバックアップ
